ai.summary: A short, easy 1.6 km coastal memorial walk in the UK to Gloup Memorial. Suitable for most ages and fitness levels, with gentle terrain and scenic views along the coast.
ai.terrain_summary: Short coastal path with mostly even surfaces. Some sections may be grassy or compact earth; expect occasional uneven ground and small steps near the memorial.
ai.safety_notes: As with coastal paths, check weather and tide conditions. Stay on the designated path, keep away from cliff edges, and supervise children. Wear sturdy footwear and bring a light layer for wind and changeable weather.
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn; winter can be windy and damp
